name: Edge 3i
headline: High performance plaster-up-to loudspeaker
description: Compact plaster-up-to invisible loudspeaker delivering warm, full-bodied Edge-series tonality for smaller rooms and cost-sensitive architectural installations.
story: Compact and discreet, the Edge 3i brings the warm, full-bodied tonality of the Edge series to installations where space is limited or where a cost-effective option is needed. Ideal for smaller rooms, guest spaces, or corridors, its reduced footprint allows it to fit between tighter stud and joist layouts while maintaining the same plaster-up-to integration and seamless finish as larger Edge models. Powered by Amina’s proprietary exciter technology and supported by Optidrive®, Opti-damping®, Reduced Resonance Exciter® and ToneRelief® panel design, the Edge 3i delivers natural, engaging sound with smooth frequency balance while preserving complete architectural invisibility.
specs: Electrical connection Blue butt-splice crimp terminals (14–16 AWG)
Fixing requirements Backbox CV300 or Mounting Blocks

lifestyle.title: Edge 3i — Architectural Detail
lifestyle.caption: A compact plaster-up-to form that dissolves into the junctions of the space, preserving clean lines while sound quietly fills the room.

lifestyle.title: Edge 3i — Side Profile
lifestyle.caption: An ultra-slim profile designed to sit effortlessly within shallow cavities, allowing architecture to remain uninterrupted.

name: Edge 5i
headline: High performance plaster-up-to loudspeaker
description: Versatile plaster-up-to invisible loudspeaker combining Edge-series warmth and presence for a wide range of residential and commercial spaces.
story: The Edge 5i combines the characteristic warmth and presence of the Edge series with a format suitable for a wide variety of residential and commercial environments. Using the same plaster-up-to installation method with an integrated ridge detail, it ensures clean, consistent finishes in taped-and-jointed walls or ceilings. Proprietary Amina exciter technology together with Optidrive®, Opti-damping®, Reduced Resonance Exciter® and ToneRelief® panel innovations deliver a smooth, natural frequency balance with engaging musicality.
specs: Electrical connection Blue butt-splice crimp terminals (14–16 AWG)
Fixing requirements Backbox CV345 or Mounting Blocks

lifestyle.title: Edge 5i — Side Profile
lifestyle.caption: Balanced proportions allow the panel to merge seamlessly into plastered surfaces, supporting richer sound without visual presence.

name: Edge 7i
headline: Flagship plaster-up-to invisible loudspeaker
description: Flagship Edge-series plaster-up-to panel delivering greater scale, authority, and extended low-frequency reach while remaining completely hidden.
story: The Edge 7i is the flagship of Amina’s plaster-up-to Edge series, designed to deliver an engaging and impactful listening experience while remaining fully concealed within the architecture. Its raised 0.7mm ridge acts as a natural stop bead, enabling plaster finishes to feather seamlessly for flawless integration. Distinguished by its extended low-frequency reach, the Edge 7i delivers added weight and authority while retaining the warm, balanced tonality of the Edge range.
applications: Large living rooms and open-plan spaces
specs: Electrical connection Blue butt-splice crimp terminals (14–16 AWG)
Fixing requirements Backbox CV345 or Mounting Blocks

lifestyle.caption: Clean junctions and natural light emphasise the absence of visible technology, allowing sound to feel embedded within the space.

lifestyle.caption: The flagship panel refined to feather effortlessly into plastered surfaces, supporting greater scale without visual weight.
